item.title: atom在linux下安装插件失败的解决方案
item.description: gyp info it worked if it ends with ok gyp info using node-gyp@2.0.2 gyp info using node@0.10.40 | linux | x64 gyp http GET https://atom.io/download/atom-shell/v0.34.0/node-v0.34.0.tar.gz gyp WARN install got an error, rolling back install gyp ERR! install error gyp ERR! stack Error: This is most likely not a problem with node-gyp or the package itself and gyp ERR! stack is related to network connectivity. In most cases you are behind
